text:
The Reedfoots are a small clan of [[halfling]]s that dwell on the [[White River]] and [[Yedan River]] in [[Harkenwold]], [[Breland]]. They have six keelboats scattered up and down the watercourses, each home to a large and boisterous family. The leader of the clan is Willet Reedfoot, an older, charmingly roguish fellow who earns a comfortable living storytelling in the villages close to the rivers.

!! During the [[Reavers of Harkenwold|The Reavers of Harkenwold]] Adventure

The Reedfoots are allies of [[Curlot Grem]], and help the resistance against the [[Iron Circle]] by carrying messages and spies across the county.
title: Reedfoot Clan
